name: CareTaker (itch)
description:
A short game on the troubles of care taking. 

Game made in C++ as a final project for school. 

Take care of the small pink circle by making sure it is fed and clean.

The red circle really can represent anything you like it to. Another person not helping you, your own frustration with how much care the pink circle needs or anything else you desire it to be. That's the whole point.
